author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Following the migration of jet reconstruction sequences to Task in #27887 and the failure in wf 140.54 deriving from this move discussed in #27919 , the updated suggested by @jeongeun is provided. 

#### PR validation:

Test wf 140.54 and 136.85 run successfully.
title: Update Reconstruction_Data for move of jetCorrectorsForReco to Task
